channel.title: Paradise 317 Client + Source
channel.description:
Just going to dump this here, The source is organized like a 562. This is allstar, but it's decent, even though the pictures don't show that. (If anyone cares, we all broke off this project, we lost interest.) (Making a V2 of this, will be sure to fix up the shitty client looks.) (IP is set to our server's old ip, Change it if you want to mess with this.) (Also, the run server is set to jdk_7ju11, so if you can't run the server, change the runserver to path to your version.) Pics from advertisement thread: ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0004_zps0aca3094.png[/img] Dicing! Use :: dice to roll! [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0003_zps3aeba004.png[/img] We have Pk point rewards, for those who love to Pk! [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0001_zpsdac1a2d3.png[/img] Our Bank Pin System, Created by Alex! [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0002_zps144a8cea.png[/img] 200m Gamble, To have a chance at a variety of items! [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0016_zps173fdcc2.png[/img] Classic Godsword Mini X.D. [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0007_zps879fe451.png[/img] Jad, With some changes. [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0004_zpse2e5c3d4.png[/img] Pkbox! [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0003_zps9a5e1681.png[/img] Funpk, items are not lost on death. [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0001_zps544c6869.png[/img] Veng + One of our training Zones! [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0006_zps224f3e87.png[/img] Barrows Brothers. [IMG]http://i1326.photobucket.com/albums/u654/Dokan42/evolved0011_zps8d413cc3.png[/img] Skilling Zone, Train skills here. X.D. Other things not mentioned in the pictures: Anti-SYI Protection. Client Music, Add your own playlist, or listen to our 3 Songs that come with the client. Player Saving Works, Your player will save properly. Many Bosses Not Mentioned Within The Pictures. Some Custom Items, for those who enjoy that kind of thing. ::max to show max hit. Dark bow Minigame, and a minigame to get christmas crackers/cash. Kalphite queen to get some ***y decorative items. A 1v1 zone. Trade Dupe Fixed. Many Other Dupes Fixed. Glitch to go invisible fixed. Custom items have animations and stats. Yell Colors! Thanks To Alex! The server runs on a auto restarter, so updates can be applied if needed. A ::suggest command, we listen to player suggestions, unless they are completely 'Out there' Clan chat, Completely server sided. Crappy Skillcape emotes, which you'd expect from a Allstar Server. Planning to change some of them. Fixed Magic On Npcs. Fixed Some Minor Bugs. A General Store. 1 in 500 chance for all monsters to drop mystery box. 1bil ticket with exchange. Use ::ticket and ::exchange. Dicing, with trusted dicer rank. New Bosses. Various Bug Fixes. (There are lots of unused models in the client, feel free to remove them.) Lots of stuff I didn't mention... look through the source. Credits: Nouish Antarix Theletterqarousesme I weed I Mod allstar Myself.
Links: http://www.mediafire.com/?wdlwxo4lb0bdwxh -- Client. http://www.mediafire.com/?xdal4g4mno4nbfn -- Source.

[/quote]

item.title: Paradise 317 Client + Source
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:29, topic:506512”]On one of the pictures (the gambling one) you should add updateRequid = true; and stuff you send the player a message :
“go to the quest tab and then go back to inventory tab if the items dont dissaper”
thats becuase when you change tab its requied an update on the screen, so any way add to your gambling code the updates boolean…[/quote]
no, you’re wrong updateRequired is for player updating.

You don’t need to update the player for the quest tab to change so you clearly have no idea what you’re talking about.

Read full topic
